title: Inyouchuu The Animation
synopsis: Three students are in a school late at night fighting supernatural enemies.  As they are about to leave, they get attacked and trapped.  Based off the Inyouchuu game.
related_anime: ['Inyouchuu: Ryoushoku Gakuen Taimaroku', 'Inyouchuu', 'Inyouchuu Shoku: Ryoushokutou Taimaroku']
staff: [['Tokita, Banzou', ['Director']], ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', ['Sound Director']], ['Nobidome, Youta', ['Episode Director']], ['Takahashi, Kaoru', ['Script', ' Storyboard']]]
